From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

    Learned borrowing from Latin adhaerēre. The change of conjugation to -ir is expected.

    Pronunciation

    [edit]
    • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [ə.ðəˈɾi]
    • IPA(key): (Valencia) [a.ðeˈɾiɾ]
    • Audio (Barcelona):(file)

    Verb

    [edit]

    adherir (first-person singular present adhereixo, first-person singular preterite adherí, past participle adherit)

    1. (ambitransitive) to adhere
    2. (pronominal) to adhere [with a ‘to’], to follow

    Conjugation

    [edit]
        Conjugation of adherir (third conjugation, with -eix-)
    infinitive adherir
    gerund adherint
    past participle masculine feminine
    singular adherit adherida
    plural adherits adherides
    person singular plural
    first second third first second third
    indicative jo tu ell/ella
    vostè     		nosaltres
    nós     		vosaltres
    vós     		ells/elles
    vostès
    present adhereixo adhereixes adhereix adherim adheriu adhereixen
    imperfect adheria adheries adheria adheríem adheríeu adherien
    future adheriré adheriràs adherirà adherirem adherireu adheriran
    preterite adherí adherires adherí adherírem adheríreu adheriren
    conditional adheriria adheriries adheriria adheriríem adheriríeu adheririen
    subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
    vostè     		nosaltres
    nós     		vosaltres
    vós     		ells/elles
    vostès
    present adhereixi adhereixis adhereixi adherim adheriu adhereixin
    imperfect adherís adherissis adherís adheríssim adheríssiu adherissin
    imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
    vós     		vostès
    affirmative — adhereix adhereixi adherim adheriu adhereixin
    negative (no) — no adhereixis no adhereixi no adherim no adheriu no adhereixin

    Derived terms

    [edit]
    • adheriment

    Related terms

    [edit]
    • adherència
    • adherent
    • adhesió
    • adhesiu

    Further reading

    [edit]
    • “adherir”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007

    Galician

    [edit]

    Alternative forms

    [edit]
    • aderir (reintegrationist)

    Etymology

    [edit]

      Learned borrowing from Latin adhaerēre.

      Verb

      [edit]

      adherir (first-person singular present adhiro, third-person singular present adhire, first-person singular preterite adherín, past participle adherido)

      1. to adhere

      Conjugation

      [edit]
          Conjugation of adherir (e becomes i when stressed)
      Singular Plural
      First-person
      (eu)       		Second-person
      (ti)       		Third-person
      (el / ela / Vde.)       		First-person
      (nós)       		Second-person
      (vós)       		Third-person
      (eles / elas / Vdes.)
      Infinitive
      Impersonal adherir
      Personal adherir adherires adherir adherirmos adherirdes adheriren
      Gerund
      adherindo
      Past participle
      Masculine adherido adheridos
      Feminine adherida adheridas
      Indicative
      Present adhiro adhires adhire adherimos adherides adhiren
      Imperfect adhería adherías adhería adheriamos adheriades adherían
      Preterite adherín adheriches adheriu adherimos adheristes adheriron
      Pluperfect adherira adheriras adherira adheriramos adherirades adheriran
      Future adherirei adherirás adherirá adheriremos adheriredes adherirán
      Conditional adheriría adherirías adheriría adheririamos adheririades adherirían
      Subjunctive
      Present adhira adhiras adhira adhiramos adhirades adhiran
      Imperfect adherise adherises adherise adherísemos adherísedes adherisen
      Future adherir adherires adherir adherirmos adherirdes adheriren
      Imperative
      Affirmative adhire adhira adhiramos adheride adhiran
      Negative (non) non adhiras non adhira non adhiramos non adhirades non adhiran

      Further reading

      [edit]
      • “adherir”, in Dicionario da Real Academia Galega (in Galician), A Coruña: Royal Galician Academy, 2012–2025

      Portuguese

      [edit]

      Verb

      [edit]

      adherir (first-person singular present adhiro, third-person singular present adhere, first-person singular preterite adheri, past participle adherido)

      1. pre-reform spelling (used until 1943 in Brazil and 1911 in Portugal) of aderir

      Conjugation

      [edit]
          Conjugation of adherir (i-e alternation in present singular) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
      Singular Plural
      First-person
      (eu)       		Second-person
      (tu)       		Third-person
      (ele / ela / você)       		First-person
      (nós)       		Second-person
      (vós)       		Third-person
      (eles / elas / vocês)
      Infinitive
      Impersonal adherir
      Personal adherir adherires adherir adherirmos adherirdes adherirem
      Gerund
      adherindo
      Past participle
      Masculine adherido adheridos
      Feminine adherida adheridas
      Indicative
      Present adhiro adheres adhere adherimos adheris adherem
      Imperfect adheria adherias adheria adheríamos adheríeis adheriam
      Preterite adheri adheriste adheriu adherimos adheristes adheriram
      Pluperfect adherira adheriras adherira adheríramos adheríreis adheriram
      Future adherirei adherirás adherirá adheriremos adherireis adherirão
      Conditional adheriria adheririas adheriria adheriríamos adheriríeis adheririam
      Subjunctive
      Present adhira adhiras adhira adhiramos adhirais adhiram
      Imperfect adherisse adherisses adherisse adheríssemos adherísseis adherissem
      Future adherir adherires adherir adherirmos adherirdes adherirem
      Imperative
      Affirmative adhere adhira adhiramos adheri adhiram
      Negative (não) não adhiras não adhira não adhiramos não adhirais não adhiram

      Derived terms

      [edit]
      • adherência
      • adhesão

      Spanish

      [edit]

      Etymology

      [edit]

        Learned borrowing from Latin adhaerēre (“to cleave, to stick to”).

        Pronunciation

        [edit]
        • IPA(key): /adeˈɾiɾ/ [a.ð̞eˈɾiɾ]
        • Audio (Venezuela):(file)
        • Rhymes: -iɾ
        • Syllabification: a‧dhe‧rir

        Verb

        [edit]

        adherir (first-person singular present adhiero, first-person singular preterite adherí, past participle adherido)

        1. (transitive, intransitive, reflexive) to adhere, stick
          Synonym: pegar

        Conjugation

        [edit]
            Conjugation of adherir (e-ie-i alternation) (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
        infinitive adherir
        gerund adhiriendo
        past participle masculine feminine
        singular adherido adherida
        plural adheridos adheridas
        singular plural
        1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
        indicative yo tú
        vos         		él/ella/ello
        usted         		nosotros
        nosotras         		vosotros
        vosotras         		ellos/ellas
        ustedes
        present adhiero adhierestú
        adherísvos         		adhiere adherimos adherís adhieren
        imperfect adhería adherías adhería adheríamos adheríais adherían
        preterite adherí adheriste adhirió adherimos adheristeis adhirieron
        future adheriré adherirás adherirá adheriremos adheriréis adherirán
        conditional adheriría adherirías adheriría adheriríamos adheriríais adherirían
        subjunctive yo tú
        vos         		él/ella/ello
        usted         		nosotros
        nosotras         		vosotros
        vosotras         		ellos/ellas
        ustedes
        present adhiera adhierastú
        adhirásvos2         		adhiera adhiramos adhiráis adhieran
        imperfect
        (ra)         		adhiriera adhirieras adhiriera adhiriéramos adhirierais adhirieran
        imperfect
        (se)         		adhiriese adhirieses adhiriese adhiriésemos adhirieseis adhiriesen
        future1 adhiriere adhirieres adhiriere adhiriéremos adhiriereis adhirieren
        imperative — tú
        vos         		usted nosotros
        nosotras         		vosotros
        vosotras         		ustedes
        affirmative adhieretú
        adherívos         		adhiera adhiramos adherid adhieran
        negative no adhieras no adhiera no adhiramos no adhiráis no adhieran

        1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
        2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

            Selected combined forms of adherir (e-ie-i alternation)

        These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

        singular plural
        1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
        with infinitive adherir dative adherirme adherirte adherirle, adherirse adherirnos adheriros adherirles, adherirse

        accusative adhiriéndome adhiriéndote adhiriéndolo, adhiriéndola, adhiriéndose adhiriéndonos adhiriéndoos adhiriéndolos, adhiriéndolas, adhiriéndose
        with informal second-person singular tú imperative adhiere dative adhiéreme adhiérete adhiérele adhiérenos not used adhiéreles
        accusative adhiéreme adhiérete adhiérelo, adhiérela adhiérenos not used adhiérelos, adhiérelas
        with informal second-person singular vos imperative adherí dative adherime adherite adherile adherinos not used adheriles
        accusative adherime adherite adherilo, adherila adherinos not used adherilos, adherilas
        with formal second-person singular imperative adhiera dative adhiérame not used adhiérale, adhiérase adhiéranos not used adhiérales
        accusative adhiérame not used adhiéralo, adhiérala, adhiérase adhiéranos not used adhiéralos, adhiéralas
        with first-person plural imperative adhiramos dative not used adhirámoste adhirámosle adhirámonos adhirámoos adhirámosles
        accusative not used adhirámoste adhirámoslo, adhirámosla adhirámonos adhirámoos adhirámoslos, adhirámoslas
        with informal second-person plural imperative adherid dative adheridme not used adheridle adheridnos adheríos adheridles
        accusative adheridme not used adheridlo, adheridla adheridnos adheríos adheridlos, adheridlas
        with formal second-person plural imperative adhieran dative adhiéranme not used adhiéranle adhiérannos not used adhiéranles, adhiéranse
        accusative adhiéranme not used adhiéranlo, adhiéranla adhiérannos not used adhiéranlos, adhiéranlas, adhiéranse

        infinitive adherirse
        gerund adhiriéndose
        past participle masculine feminine
        singular adherido adherida
        plural adheridos adheridas
        singular plural
        1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
        personal non-finite yo tú
        vos         		él/ella/ello
        usted         		nosotros
        nosotras         		vosotros
        vosotras         		ellos/ellas
        ustedes
        infinitive adherirme adherirte adherirse adherirnos adheriros adherirse
        gerund adhiriéndome adhiriéndote adhiriéndose adhiriéndonos adhiriéndoos adhiriéndose
        indicative yo tú
        vos         		él/ella/ello
        usted         		nosotros
        nosotras         		vosotros
        vosotras         		ellos/ellas
        ustedes
        present me adhiero te adhierestú
        te adherísvos         		se adhiere nos adherimos os adherís se adhieren

        vos         		usted nosotros
        nosotras         		vosotros
        vosotras         		ustedes
        affirmative adhiéretetú
        adheritevos         		adhiérase adhirámonos adheríos adhiéranse
        negative no te adhieras no se adhiera no nos adhiramos no os adhiráis no se adhieran

        1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
        2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
